summary: It adds a new twohanded warriors companion in the four shields tavern in dragon bridge
descriptionHtml:
It adds a new twohanded warriors companion in the four shields tavern in dragon bridge.

installation:
- extract the file by the rar. archivie.
- copy the mod file in your data folder
- the companion will be found in the four shields tavern in dragonbridge.

enjoy!

sorry for my english.
author: TheImperator02
